assignments.name: Assign_Company_Domains_To_Be_Deleted
assignments.label: Assign Company Domains To Be Deleted

assignments.name: Assign_Error_Message_No_Selected_Row
assignments.label: Assign Error Message No Selected Row

assignments.name: Assign_URL_To_Domain_To_Be_Created
assignments.label: Assign URL To Domain To Be Created

assignments.name: Clear_Company_Domain_Assignments_After_Create
assignments.label: Clear Company Domain Assignments After Create

assignments.name: Clear_Company_Domain_Assignments_After_Delete
assignments.label: Clear Company Domain Assignments After Delete

formulas.name: ErrorTextClean
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!ErrorText}, 'You are not allowed to register a generic domain'), 'You are not allowed to register a generic domain. Please input a valid company domain.', IF(CONTAINS({!ErrorText}, 'Please ensure your domain is complete'), 'Please ensure your domain is complete with a suffix such as .com', ''))

formulas.name: GenericDomainCheck
formulas.expression: OR( CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain} , "gmail"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "hotmail"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "yahoo"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "outlook"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "aol"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "icloud"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "gmx.com"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "onmail"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "mail.com"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "fastmail.com"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "proton.me"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain} , "live.com"), CONTAINS ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, "live.dk"), (RIGHT ({!Loop_Repeater_Entries.Domain}, 3)) == ".ru" )

formulas.name: NumberStatusScreenErrorMsg
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!$Flow.FaultMessage},"Number Porting Specific date should be at least 5 days in to the future for Porting numbers."), "Number Porting Specific date should be at least 5 days in to the future for Porting numbers.", "An unmanaged error occurred. Please contact your Administrator and try again")

recordLookups.name: Get_AL_that_requires_POA
recordLookups.label: Get AL that requires POA (Just the first if any exist)

fields.name: GenericDomainError
fields.fieldText:
We were unable to add one or more of your provided domains due to it being a generic domain. Please input a valid company domain.


Domains affected: {!GenericDomains}

fields.name: IncompleteDomainError
fields.fieldText:
We were unable to add one or more of your provided domains due to it being an incomplete domain. Please ensure your domain is complete with a suffix such as .com.


Domains affected: {!IncompleteDomains}

textTemplates.name: ErrorTextNoSelectedLineForDelete
textTemplates.text: Please select a line to delete.

textTemplates.name: GeneralFaultMessage
textTemplates.text: An unexpected issue occurred and a system administrator has been informed. If the issue persists, please reach out to your account manager.
